description:
You can't afford to have security be an optional or "nice-to-have"
feature in your applications. Luckily, Django has your back: this
workshop will introduce you to thinking about security, cover a broad
range of security concerns from the mundane to the arcane, and walk you
through, in detail, how Django and the broader Django and Python
ecosystems can help protect you and your users from them.
title: An introduction to secure web development with Django and Python
